title: JC Toys La Newborn "REAL BOY" Baby Doll (Realistic 17" Anatomically Correct) (18108)

description: If you're looking for an anatomically correct, full-vinyl baby doll baby doll that captures the once-in-a-lifetime experience of bringing home a new baby, then this La Newborn is the perfect doll for you! Every feature of the La Newborn was hand-designed in Spain by the Berenguer Boutique award-winning team of doll specialists. The result of their expert work is a doll with finely-detailed features, like cute and crinkly toes, life-like eyes, and realistic expressions that encourage nurturing. This La Newborn is made in Spain, safety tested and approved for children ages 2 or older. The doll is 17" long and weighs approximately 2lbs. This La Newborn comes dressed in a sweet blue and white dot layette set. Set includes removable bubble suit, super soft socks, hat and cozy blanket. You child will love swaddling their baby, keeping them cuddly, safe and loved. No shortcuts were made in the making of this doll. You can keep it good as new for many years because of its durable and easily washable vinyl body. To make the doll brand new again, all it takes is a simple spot wash with warm water and mild soap. The body is unscented and the only moving parts are the jointed shoulders, hips, and neck. These rotating body parts allow you to easily add and remove the doll's clothing for cleaning and dress-up fun. The La Newborn is manufactured directly by our company, JC Toys, a world leader in doll manufacturing. JC Toys is a family run and operated business with origins dating back to 1982 in South-East Spain - one of the top major toy-making and design centers in the world. Today, you can find 100s dolls, playtime accessories, and more by JC Toys on Amazon. Add smiles to a young child's face today by adding this La Newborn to your cart now, so it can be ready for checkout and shipment ASAP - thank you!.
